item.title: AWS Console and CLI Exploration
item.description: Inside the AWS Console: Explored compute machine options EC2 is the easiest of all, provides vanilla virtual machine experience for fully self-managing the infrastructure Lambda is for small fuctions or API calls App Runner provides a full-managed infrastructure to run our app handling all the scaling, load balancing, installation of software and deployment. Elastic Beanstalk is a similar service to App Runner, but there is a slight difference, Elastic Beanstalk provides more control over infrastructure after deployment, whereas App Runner manages it fully even after deployment.
